languages.text: Пресыщенная и не ведающая стыда знать Простора стекалась на Даргонус в поисках запретного. В его либрариумах можно было отыскать опасные тома, а в злачных местах — опасных людей. Власть закона не могла дотянуться до вершин шпилей, окутанных флером зловещих и мистических слухов.

The voracious and shameless nobility of the Expanse flocked to Dargonus in search of the forbidden pleasures. Its librariums harboured dangerous volumes and its dark corners harboured dangerous people. The rule of law could not reach the tops of the spires, shrouded in a veil of sinister and mystical rumours.
languages.original_text: Пресыщенная и не ведающая стыда знать Простора стекалась на Даргонус в поисках запретного. В его либрариумах можно было отыскать опасные тома, а в злачных местах — опасных людей. Власть закона не могла дотянуться до вершин шпилей, окутанных флером зловещих и мистических слухов.

traits.locale_text: The voracious and shameless nobility of the Expanse flocked to Dargonus in search of the forbidden pleasures. Its librariums sheltered dangerous volumes, and its dark places sheltered dangerous people. The rule of law could not reach the tops of the spires, shrouded in a veil of sinister and mystical rumours.

The voracious and shameless nobility of the Expanse flocked to Dargonus in search of the forbidden pleasures. Its librariums sheltered dangerous volumes, and its dark places sheltered dangerous people. The rule of law could not reach the tops of the spires, shrouded in a veil of sinister and mystical rumours.

Its librariums harboured dangerous volumes and its dark corners harboured dangerous people. The rule of law could not reach the tops of the spires, shrouded in a veil of sinister and mystical rumours.

Its librariums harboured dangerous volumes and its dark corners harboured dangerous people. The rule of law could not reach the tops of the spires, shrouded in a veil of sinister and mystical rumours.

The voracious and shameless nobility of the Expanse flocked to Dargonus in search of the forbidden pleasures. Its librariums harboured dangerous volumes and its dark corners harboured dangerous people. The rule of law could not reach the tops of the spires, shrouded in a veil of sinister and mystical rumours.

languages.text: 整个科罗努斯扩区那些贪婪而无耻的贵族全都涌向了达戈努斯，寻求禁忌的愉悦。这里的图书馆藏着危险的书籍，阴暗的角落里也藏着危险的人。尖塔成为了法外之地，笼罩在邪恶与神秘的谣言之中。
languages.original_text: The voracious and shameless nobility of the Expanse flocked to Dargonus in search of the forbidden pleasures. Its librariums harboured dangerous volumes and its dark corners harboured dangerous people. The rule of law could not reach the tops of the spires, shrouded in a veil of sinister and mystical rumours.

traits.locale_text: 整个科罗努斯扩区那些贪婪而无耻的贵族全都涌向了达戈努斯，寻求禁忌的愉悦。这里的智库藏着危险的书籍，阴暗的角落里也藏着危险的人。尖塔成为了法外之地，笼罩在邪恶与神秘的谣言之中。

languages.text: エクスパンスの欲張りで恥知らずな貴族階級は隠し財宝を探してダルゴナスに群がった。その図書館には危険な書物が隠されており、暗い街角には危険な者たちが隠れていた。法律は陰気なヴェールと謎めいた噂に包まれた尖塔の先にまでは届かなかったのだ。
languages.original_text: The voracious and shameless nobility of the Expanse flocked to Dargonus in search of the forbidden pleasures. Its librariums harboured dangerous volumes and its dark corners harboured dangerous people. The rule of law could not reach the tops of the spires, shrouded in a veil of sinister and mystical rumours.

traits.locale_text: エクスパンスの欲張りで恥知らずな貴族階級は隠し財宝を探してダルゴナスに群がった。その図書館には危険な書物が隠されており、暗い街角には危険な者たちが隠れていた。法律は陰気なヴェールと謎めいた噂に包まれた尖塔の先にまでは届かなかったのだ。

languages.text: La noblesse insatiable et sans gêne des Étendues afflua sur Dargonus en quête de plaisirs interdits. Ses librariums abritaient des ouvrages dangereux et ses recoins sombres des gens tout aussi dangereux. La loi ne s'étendait pas jusqu'au sommet des tours, enveloppées dans un voile de rumeurs sinistres et mystiques.
languages.original_text: The voracious and shameless nobility of the Expanse flocked to Dargonus in search of the forbidden pleasures. Its librariums harboured dangerous volumes and its dark corners harboured dangerous people. The rule of law could not reach the tops of the spires, shrouded in a veil of sinister and mystical rumours.

traits.locale_text: La noblesse insatiable et sans gêne des Étendues afflua sur Dargonus en quête de plaisirs interdits. Ses librariums abritaient des ouvrages dangereux et ses recoins sombres des gens tout aussi dangereux. La loi ne s'étendait pas jusqu'au sommet des tours, enveloppées dans un voile de rumeurs sinistres et mystiques.

languages.text: La voraz y descarada nobleza de la Extensión se reunió en Dargonus en busca de placeres prohibidos. Sus bibliotecariums contenían tomos peligrosos, y sus rincones oscuros, gente más peligrosa. La palabra de la ley no llegaba a lo alto de sus agujas, envueltas en un velo de rumores siniestros y místicos.
languages.original_text: The voracious and shameless nobility of the Expanse flocked to Dargonus in search of the forbidden pleasures. Its librariums harboured dangerous volumes and its dark corners harboured dangerous people. The rule of law could not reach the tops of the spires, shrouded in a veil of sinister and mystical rumours.

traits.locale_text: La voraz y descarada nobleza de la Extensión se reunió en Dargonus en busca de placeres prohibidos. Sus bibliotecas contenían tomos peligrosos y sus rincones oscuros, gente más peligrosa. La palabra de la ley no llegaba a lo alto de sus agujas, envueltas en un velo de rumores siniestros y místicos.

languages.text: Der gefräßige und schamlose Adel der Ausdehnung drängte auf der Suche nach verbotenen Freunde nach Dargonus. Seine Librariums enthielten gefährliche Folianten, und in seinen dunklen Ecken hausten gefährliche Personen. Das Gesetz konnte die Turmspitzen nicht erreichen, die in einen Schleier von bösen und mystischen Gerüchten gehüllt waren.
languages.original_text: The voracious and shameless nobility of the Expanse flocked to Dargonus in search of the forbidden pleasures. Its librariums harboured dangerous volumes and its dark corners harboured dangerous people. The rule of law could not reach the tops of the spires, shrouded in a veil of sinister and mystical rumours.

traits.locale_text: Der gefräßige und schamlose Adel der Ausdehnung drängte auf der Suche nach verbotenen Freunde nach Dargonus. Seine Librariums enthielten gefährliche Folianten, und in seinen dunklen Ecken hausten gefährliche Personen. Das Gesetz konnte die Turmspitzen nicht erreichen, die in einen Schleier von bösen und mystischen Gerüchten gehüllt waren.

languages.text: Enginlik'in doymak ve utanmak nedir bilmeyen soyluları, yasaklı zevkler peşinde Dargonus'a akın etti. Libraryumları tehlikeli ciltlerle, karanlık sokakları da tehlikeli kimselerle doluydu. Kanunlar, uğursuz ve mistik söylentilerle örtülü kulelerin tepelerinde geçerliliğini kaybediyordu.
languages.original_text: The voracious and shameless nobility of the Expanse flocked to Dargonus in search of the forbidden pleasures. Its librariums harboured dangerous volumes and its dark corners harboured dangerous people. The rule of law could not reach the tops of the spires, shrouded in a veil of sinister and mystical rumours.

traits.locale_text: Enginlik'in doymak ve utanmak nedir bilmeyen soyluları, yasaklı zevkler peşinde Dargonus'ta biriktiler. Libraryumları tehlikeli ciltlere, karanlık köşeleri tehlikeli kişilere ev sahipliği yapıyordu. Kanunlar, uğursuz ve mistik söylentilerden oluşan bir perdeyle örtülü kulelerin tepelerine kadar ulaşamıyordu.
